Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan won the toss and elected to field.
India's losses against Pakistan and Sri Lanka in the Super 4 stage suggest teams chasing have won the majority of matches in Dubai.
Rohit Sharma wanted to take a break due to tough conditions and the upcoming World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India made three changes for the match, bringing in Axar Patel and Deepak Chahar.
Dinesh Karthik returned to the playing XI for the second time in the tournament.
